name: jQuery.parseXML
title: jQuery.parseXML()
desc: Parses a string into an XML document.

argument.desc: a well-formed XML string to be parsed
argument.name: data

examples.desc: Create a jQuery object using an XML string and obtain the value of the title node.

entries.longdesc: jQuery.parseXML uses the native parsing function of the browser to create a valid XML Document. This document can then be passed to jQuery to create a typical jQuery object that can be traversed and manipulated.
